### Vocational Training for First Aid and Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation (CPR) and Automated External Defibrillator (AED) Training 

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is soliciting a proposal for Vocational Training in First Aid and Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation (CPR) and Automated External Defibrillator (AED) Training for the Prairie Regions.

### Tender Details

* Solicitation Number: 21C50-22-4069387
* Amendment Number: 4
* Closing Date: May 22, 2023, 14:00:00
* Publication Date: April 19, 2023
* Solicitation Type: Request for Standing Offer

### Description of the Requirement

The Contracting Authority, CSC, CORCAN AB, MB, and SK, requires third-party certification for Standard First Aid and CPR Training and Automated External Defibrillator (AED) Training to groups of offenders at various institutions and Community Industries in Alberta, Manitoba, and Saskatchewan.

### Objectives

To provide third-party certification in First Aid, Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation (CPR) Adult, and Automated External Defibrillator (AED) Training to groups of offenders at the locations listed in Section 5.

### Deliverables

* Sufficient resources (instructor(s)) to facilitate in-class training for each of the locations proposed for the training.
* Training materials, written, practical exercises, and testing as required for the completion of the applicable course.
* A comprehensive equipment and tool list to be submitted to the Project Authority or delegated Manager two (2) weeks in advance of the program start date.
* Delivery of all materials/equipment to the location prior to start of course.
